participant_2.background:
I am in my second year of medical school.
My mom is the best baker in my family.
I have two children but i am divorced.
I am a hindu living in louisiana.
My favorite thing to do is watch old movies.

content.text: Hi! What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to watch old movies! I'm a huge fan of classic cinema.
Oh, that's great! I love old movies too. What's your favorite?
I'm not sure I can pick just one, but I really love the original Star Wars trilogy.
Those are great! I'm a big fan of Star Wars too.
Me too! I've seen all of the movies multiple times.
Me too! I'm really excited for the new one coming out next year.
Me too! I can't wait to see what happens next in the story.
What other kinds of movies do you like to watch?
I like all kinds of movies, but I especially love comedies and action movies.
Me too! I love comedies because they make me laugh.
Me too! And I love action movies because they're so exciting.
What's your favorite action movie?
I'm not sure I can pick just one, but I really love the Mission Impossible movies.
Those are great! I love Tom Cruise in those movies.
Me too! He's so good in them.
What other movies have you seen recently?
I recently saw the new Jumanji movie. It was really good!
I heard it was good! I want to see it soon.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
